name: Just a Minute! (JayMehta 2006)
description:
JUST A MINUTE!

(THIS GAME IS HARD)

Just a minute is a 2D action platformer especially made for the Black thron prod Game jam 2021!

HOW TO PLAY :

As the title says you have to survive for a 60 seconds in the game!

when the timer reached 0 you win!

but it is not as easy as it seems, enemies will spawn, chase and attack you! you can kill the enemies by clicking on them, but whenever you kill an enemy it adds 5 seconds on the Timer, which makes the game interesting!

Enemies destroy themselves after 10-15 seconds and  if you touch them you die!

So, basically stay away from enemies , kill if required and survive the most difficult 60 seconds!

it follows the theme and was made under the time limit of the BTP game jam 2020.

Thank you :)

Have an awesome day!

Jay Mehta!
